com.hazelcast.internal.memory

Interface MemoryManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HsaHeapMemoryManager, MemoryManagerBean

    public interface MemoryManager
extends Disposable
    Contract to allocate and access memory in an abstract address space, which is not necessarily the underlying CPU's native address space. Memory allocated from the MemoryAllocator must be accessed through the MemoryAccessor.
